headline: Productivity Hacks for Salespeople
description: Every person in the world gets 24 hours a day. The thing that matters most is how the hours of a day are utilized by a person. Salespeople, more than anyone else, must be efficient. They do spend a lot of time travelling, contacting, socializing, and interacting with target buyers, after all. https://incentivate.in/blog/10-productivity-hacks-for-salespeople/
headline_zh-Hans: 销售人员的生产力小窍门
headline_zh-Hant: 銷售人員的生產力小竅門
description_zh-Hans: 世界上每个人每天都有24小时。最重要的是一个人如何利用一天的时间。销售人员，比其他任何人都要有效率。毕竟，他们确实花了很多时间去旅行、接触、社交和与目标买家互动。https://incentivate.in/blog/10-productivity-hacks-for-salespeople/
description_zh-Hant: 世界上每個人每天都有24小時。最重要的是一個人如何利用一天的時間。銷售人員，比其他任何人都要有效率。畢竟，他們確實花了很多時間去旅行、接觸、社交和與目標買家互動。https://incentivate.in/blog/10-productivity-hacks-for-salespeople/
